titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued in honor of William C. Velasquez, the national Hispanic civic leader.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Postal Service.

bill.summary: 5/6/1999--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that: (1) a postage stamp should be issued by the U.S. Postal Service in honor of William C. Velasquez; and (2) the Citizens' Stamp Advisory Committee should recommend to the Postmaster General that such stamp be issued.
